channel.title: Samuel Haskell on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Samuel Haskell on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Son of Hollywood Producer Suspected in Triple Murder Found Dead in L.A. Jail Ahead of Hearing
item.description: Samuel Haskell, Jr. is accused of the 2023 killings of Mei Haskell, and her parents, Yanxiang Wang and Gaoshan Li, in the Tarzana home they all shared.
